tool.name: SBML to SBOL
tool.description: Convert a SBML file, or a collection in the form of a TAR, into a single SBOL file

param.name: topX
param.label: Top pathways to convert to SBOL

tool.help:
SBML to SBOL ================
Convert a single or multiple SBML files to SBOL using the UNIPROT id's from Selenzyme. Here the Ribosome Binding Site (RBS) strengths are characterized to be later used by the PartsGenie node.
Input -----
Required:
* **input**\ : (string) Path to either tar.xz input collection of SBML files or a single SBML file. * **input_format**\ : (string) Format of the input * **include_rbs**\ : (boolean, default: True) Add or not RBS * **rbs_strengths**\ : (string) List of strengths as int in string format
Advanced options:
* **pathway_id**\ : (string, default: rp_pathway) The SBML groups ID (defined in rpReader) that points to the heterologous reactions and chemical species. * **max_prot_per_react**\ : (integer, default: 3) Include the Ribosome Biding Site output in the SBOL
Output ------
* **output**\ : (string) Path to the output SBOL file
